smile.plot

Class StaircasePlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.plot.Shape
      • smile.plot.Plot
        • smile.plot.StaircasePlot

  • public class StaircasePlot
extends Plot
    Staircase plot is a special case of line which is most useful to display empirical distribution.
